      • executeComponentViewPostHandle

        public static void executeComponentViewPostHandle(javafx.scene.Node handleReturnValue,
                                                  EmbeddedFXComponent component,
                                                  org.jacpfx.api.message.Message<javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object> message)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes post handle method in application main thread. The result value of handle method (from worker thread) is Input for the postHandle Method. The return value or the handleReturnValue are the root node of this component.
        Parameters:
        handleReturnValue - the UI return value after "handle(message)" ComponentHandle.handle(org.quickstart.api.message.Message) was executed
        component, - a component
        message, - the current message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when an Exception occures while execute ComponentView.postHandle(Object, org.quickstart.api.message.Message)
